sentence.Network_en: Please enclose your remittance, making cheques payable to Thames Valley Technology.
sentence.Network_cn: 请附上汇款，支票收款人为泰晤士河谷科技公司。

sentence.Network_en: Please return the completed form with your remittance.
sentence.Network_cn: 请将填好的表格连同汇款寄回。

sentence.Network_en: Your last month's salary will be paid by remittance.
sentence.Network_cn: 最后一个月的薪水将通过汇寄的方式付给你.

entry.def: A remittance is a sum of money that you send to someone.

example.ex: Please enclose your remittance, making cheques payable to Thames Valley Technology.
example.tran: 请附上汇款，支票收款人为泰晤士河谷科技公司。

means.word_mean: 1. a payment of money sent to a person in another place

auth_sentence.content: So we are encouraging countries to think about encouraging competition in remittance markets.
auth_sentence.res_content: So we are encouraging countries to think about encouraging competition in remittance markets.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So we are encouraging countries to think about encouraging competition in remittance markets.

auth_sentence.content: Remittance flows to developing countries are now actually more than three times that of official development assistance.
auth_sentence.res_content: Remittance flows to developing countries are now actually more than three times that of official development assistance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Remittance flows to developing countries are now actually more than three times that of official development assistance.

auth_sentence.content: Not only do households now have more mouths to feed, but relief workers say they have also lost much-needed remittance money.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Not only do households now have more mouths to feed, but relief workers say they have also lost much-needed remittance money.

sentences.en: Your last month’s salary will be paid by remittance.
sentences.cn: 最后一个月的薪水将通过汇寄的方式付给你。

sentences.en: He sends regular remittances to his parents.
